sourcesContent:
SpaceX Mission Launch List

Filter Data

  • Year
  • {{year}}
  • Landing Success/Failure
  • Successful Landings
  • Successful Launches
  • Reset Filters

{{launch.mission_name}}

Launch Year: {{launch.launch_year}}

Location: {{launch.launch_site.site_name}}

Launch Success: {{launch.launch_success}}

Land Success: {{ launch.rocket.first_stage.cores[0].land_success !== null ? launch.rocket.first_stage.cores[0].land_success : 'No data' }}
import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-missionlist', templateUrl: './missionlist.component.html', styleUrls: ['./missionlist.component.css'] }) export class MissionlistComponent { launches: any[] = []; flightNum: number | undefined; yearSelected: number | undefined; launchYears = ['2006', '2007', '2008', '2009', '2010', '2011', '2012', '2013', '2014', '2015', '2016', '2017', '2018', '2019', '2020']; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { this.loadLaunches(); } loadLaunches() { this.http.get('https://api.spacexdata.com/v3/launches').subscribe((launches: any) => { this.launches = launches; }); } getLaunchByYear(year: string) { this.http.get(`https://api.spacexdata.com/v3/launches?launch_year=${year}`).subscribe((response: any) => { this.launches = response; }); } filterSuccessfulLandings() { this.launches = this.launches.filter(launch => { return launch.rocket.first_stage.cores[0].land_success === true; }); } filterFailedLandings() { this.launches = this.launches.filter(launch => { return launch.rocket.first_stage.cores[0].land_success === false; }); } filterSuccessfulLaunches() { this.launches = this.launches.filter(launch => { return launch.launch_success === true; }); } filterFailedLaunches() { this.launches = this.launches.filter(launch => { return launch.launch_success === false; }); } filterLaunch(index: number, year: string) { this.getLaunchByYear(year); this.yearSelected = index; } clearFilter() { this.loadLaunches(); } }
